error.description: The OAuth 2.0 error code, with values (additional codes are specified in OpenID Connect):

error_description.description: Optional parameter providing additional human-readable information about the error.

error_uri.description: A human-readable web page with information about the error, typically intended for the client developer.

state.description: The state value, if one was passed with the request. Clients must validate the value before proceeding.
